basics.name: Oussama Hidaoui
basics.label: Master's Student
basics.summary: Passionate about the intersection of science and technology, with research interests in Reinforcement Learning, Generative Models, and Efficient Deep Learning. Currently working on distributional multi-agent reinforcement learning under partial observability.

experience.name: InstaDeep Ltd
experience.summary: Conducting research on multi-agent reinforcement learning in highly partially observable environments. Investigating the scalability of distributional offline RL methods in MARL.

experience.name: IMT-Atlantique
experience.summary: Worked on high-resolution reconstruction of global oceanic dissolved oxygen levels. Analyzed deoxygenation trends to understand long-term environmental impacts.
highlights: Collaborated with Dr. Said Ouala and Dr. Zouhair Lachkar.

experience.name: Green Energy Park
experience.summary: Worked on gap filling of power generation time series data of PV (Photovoltaic) systems.

education.institution: African Institute for Mathematical Sciences (AIMS) and University of Cape Town (UCT)
courses: Probabilistic ML, RL, Generative Modeling, LLMs, AI for Science
Applied Mathematics, Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence
